body: The steel cover of this slim journal has taken its fair share of abuse; acid scars and minor slag spots show where the journal was subjected to intense working conditions. Equations, balances, and chemical notations mark the margins of the pages—with some formulae, it is difficult to tell where the notes end and the formula begins.
name: Lab Journal of Constance Inflix (Level 5 Alchemist)
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Lab Journal of Constance Inflix (Level 5 Alchemist)

sections.body:
2nd—blur, delay poison, fire breath, transmute potion to poison, vomit swarm

1st—bomber's eye, comprehend languages, cure light wounds, jump, keen senses, negate aroma, resist energy, touch of the sea
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Lab Journal of Constance Inflix (Level 5 Alchemist)/Formula
sections.name: Formula
Preparation Ritual
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Lab Journal of Constance Inflix (Level 5 Alchemist)/Preparation Ritual

sections.body: The alchemical knowledge granted by this book protects you from poisons and alchemical items. Spend this boon's effect as an immediate action when you make a saving throw against poison or an alchemical item but before rolling the saving throw. You gain a +4 bonus on that saving throw.
sections.name: Alchemical Protection
sections.url: pfsrd://Ultimate Magic/Rules/Mastering Magic/Spellbooks/Spellbooks/Lab Journal of Constance Inflix (Level 5 Alchemist)/Preparation Ritual/Alchemical Protection
